title: Gary Returns, Sakurai Discusses Next Super Smash Bros - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.02.21
description:
Blessing and Gary talk about what's up with the next Smash Bros, New World currencies, and the influence of GTA III.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:09 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is happening THIS SATURDAY from 11am to 11pm. That’s gonna be a bunch of games like Mario Party and Metal Gear, a bunch of shenanigans like Nick & Andy taking the SATs and me drinking too much whisky, and MORE. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames but you can donate and join the team right now by going to KindaFunny.com/ExtraLife. The goal is to raise $100,000 for Children’s Miracle Network hospitals. It’s a good cause so come out, support, and let’s have a good time.
A new episode of PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. It’s Janet and I talking about the STATE of State of Play, PlayStation games coming to PC, and our different opinions on Dark Pictures: House of Ashes. That’s up on Youtube.com/Kidnafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Over the weekend, the final episode of The Arkham Files went up. That is Barrett’s breakdown of the Arkham series. This final episode is all about Arkham Knight. That’s up right now for your viewing pleasure on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:11:45 - Smash Bros. director Sakurai says he’s undecided if he’ll make another - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:25:55 - New World Disables 'All Forms Of Wealth Transfers' After Gold Exploit Found - Luke Plunkett @ Kotaku
00:37:25 -  Ad  
00:40:30 - A bunch of developers are reflecting on the launch of GTA III - Sid Shuman @ PS Blog
00:57:20 - PS5 issue that might have locked players out of digital games appears to have been fixed - Ali Jones @ GamesRadar
00:59:00 - Out today
01:03:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy

content:encoded:
Blessing and Gary talk about what's up with the next Smash Bros, New World currencies, and the influence of GTA III.


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:10:09 - Housekeeping

Extra Life is happening THIS SATURDAY from 11am to 11pm. That’s gonna be a bunch of games like Mario Party and Metal Gear, a bunch of shenanigans like Nick & Andy taking the SATs and me drinking too much whisky, and MORE. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames but you can donate and join the team right now by going to KindaFunny.com/ExtraLife. The goal is to raise $100,000 for Children’s Miracle Network hospitals. It’s a good cause so come out, support, and let’s have a good time.

A new episode of PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. It’s Janet and I talking about the STATE of State of Play, PlayStation games coming to PC, and our different opinions on Dark Pictures: House of Ashes. That’s up on Youtube.com/Kidnafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.

Over the weekend, the final episode of The Arkham Files went up. That is Barrett’s breakdown of the Arkham series. This final episode is all about Arkham Knight. That’s up right now for your viewing pleasure on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
